title: The Economies of East and Southeast Asia
description: Examines the pattern of international trade, investment, and industrial structure in Asia. Examines competing explanations of rapid growth of Japan, Korea, and Taiwan; presents an overview of economic developments in China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. Concludes with an analysis of high technology trade and multinationals in Asia in 2000 and beyond.
class_notes: Enrollment in and attendance of secondary sections is strongly encouraged for student success in this course.
